data.placeholder: Heading text

data.value: We seek intellectually curious and motivated students with a record of achievement inside and outside the classroom. We select those who will benefit from our distinctive online curriculum and contribute to our community.

data.value: You’ve explored South Forest through this website and gotten a feel for who we are and how we operate, for our supportive staff, expert instructors, and global student community that enjoys a vibrant life inside and outside our virtual classrooms. You’ve decided that South Forest is a good fit as your full-time school, part-time school, or for a single course in a subject about which you’re passionate.

data.value: Now, it’s time to begin your application by reading about the kinds of students we select, why we select them, and the information on which we base our admissions choices. Use the following checklist to ensure that you assemble and send us your information in a timely way for admission to the next acade year.

data.value: There’s no better way for you to see how it all works than to join a class. You’ll interact with students and an instructor, see how a virtual classroom functions, and learn more about our rigorous academics.

data.value: You are likely to have questions about our school. Current Stanford OHS parents have the answers and love sharing their perspectives. Join them for an online "coffee" and ask them anything—from how they manage socialization to what our academic curriculum has provided their child.
